    • 犬 [ quǎn ] dog
heisig_chinese_memo: The chihuahua is small but his mouth is like a chatterbox beast.  He lays on the floor waiting to release the thought in his brain on the next family member who comes home.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: This depicts a beast very well.  Horns and a brain on the floor with it's mouth open eating whatever it can find.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Beast " from " Single " from " Dog " in Jiajin inscription, " Single " is like a hunting tool, which means taking hunting dogs and tools to hunt. The original meaning is hunting. " Beast " originally meant hunting. Later, because the word " beast " was used to mean the extended meaning of beasts, the word " hunting " was created to mean hunting.

The oracle-bone inscriptions of the beast characters and the earlier inscriptions have the same configuration. They all change from " single " to " dog ", or from " single " to " gan ". Guo Liruo thinks that " beast " is the first article of " hunting " for hunting , because the word " beast " is from the single dog, and both are "must be used in hunting." Yang Shuda also believes that " beast " is the name for hunting poultry. For the dog, the hunter must use the dog as the guide, so the word " hunting " also follows the dog. "The extension is the name of the bird to be hunted, and the verb is the name. This is a rare occurrence in the text." The " mouth " was added later in the inscriptions, and the seal was inherited. See " single ".

The Jia Jin inscription is used as the original meaning to mean hunting in the field. Zai Fuyan: "The king comes to the beast, from Dou Yi (Lu)". Bronze is also used as a person's name.

"Shuowen": "The beast, the defender. From the dog."
humanum_short_description_en: " Beast " from " Single " from " Dog " in Jiajin inscription, " Single " is like a hunting tool, which means taking hunting dogs and tools to hunt. The original meaning is hunting.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文「獸」從「單」從「犬」，「單」象狩獵工具，表示帶着獵狗和工具去狩獵。本義概是狩獵。「獸」本來表示狩獵，後來因為「獸」字用來表示禽獸這一引申義，故另造「狩」字來表示狩獵這種動作。

　　獸字的甲骨文以及較早期的金文構形相同，均從「單」從「犬」，甲骨文或不從「單」而從「干」。郭沬若以為「獸」是狩獵之「狩」的初文，因為獸字從單從犬，兩者「均狩獵時所必用之物。」楊樹達亦認為「獸」本狩獵禽類之活動之稱，從犬者，獵必以犬為嚮導，故「狩」字亦從犬。「引申為所獵之禽之稱，動字引申為名字，此在文字中為數見不鮮之事矣。」金文後來增「口」，篆文承之。參見「單」。

　　甲金文用作本義，表示田獵，宰甫卣：「王來獸，自豆彔(麓)」。金文又用作人名。

　　《說文》：「獸，守備者。从嘼从犬。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文「獸」從「單」從「犬」，「單」象狩獵工具，表示帶着獵狗和工具去狩獵。本義概是狩獵。

①四肢無嚴格分工，通體生毛的哺乳動物的總稱：獸類。野獸。鳥獸。禽獸。獸醫。
②喻野蠻，下流：獸慾。獸行。人面獸心。
獸醫 [ shòu yī ]: veterinarian; veterinary surgeon; vet

甲金文「 獸 」從「 單 」從「 犬 」，「 單 」象狩獵工具，表示帶着獵狗和工具去狩獵。本義概是狩獵。「 獸 」本來表示狩獵，後來因為「 獸 」字用來表示禽獸這一引申義，故另造「 狩 」字來表示狩獵這種動作。 獸字的甲骨文以及較早期的金文構形相同，均從「 單 」從「 犬 」，甲骨文或不從「 單 」而從「 干 」。郭沬若以為「 獸 」是狩獵之「 狩 」的初文，因為獸字從單從犬，兩者「均狩獵時所必用之物。」楊樹達亦認為「 獸 」本狩獵禽類之活動之稱，從犬者，獵必以犬為嚮導，故「 狩 」字亦從犬。「引申為所獵之禽之稱，動字引申為名字，此在文字中為數見不鮮之事矣。」金文後來增「 口 」，篆文承之。參見「 單 」。 甲金文用作本義，表示田獵，宰甫卣：「王來獸，自豆彔(麓)」。金文又用作人名。 《說文》：「獸，守備者。从嘼从犬。」
" Beast" from " Single" from " Dog" in Jiajin inscription, " Single" is like a hunting tool, which means taking hunting dogs and tools to hunt. The original meaning is hunting. " Beast" originally meant hunting. Later, because the word " beast" was used to mean the extended meaning of beasts, the word " hunting" was created to mean hunting. The oracle-bone inscriptions of the beast characters and the earlier inscriptions have the same configuration. They all change from " single" to " dog", or from " single" to " gan". Guo Liruo thinks that " beast" is the first article of " hunting" for hunting, because the word " beast" is from the single dog, and both are "must be used in hunting." Yang Shuda also believes that " beast" is the name for hunting poultry. For the dog, the hunter must use the dog as the guide, so the word " hunting" also follows the dog. "The extension is the name of the bird to be hunted, and the verb is the name. This is a rare occurrence in the text." The " mouth" was added later in the inscriptions, and the seal was inherited. See " single". The Jia Jin inscription is used as the original meaning to mean hunting in the field. Zai Fuyan: "The king comes to the beast, from Dou Yi (Lu)". Bronze is also used as a person's name. "Shuowen": "The beast, the defender. From the dog."

獸字的基本解释

獸
shòu
见“兽”。

獸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shòu］
［《廣韻》舒救切，去宥，書。］
“兽1”的繁体字。
(1)一般指四足、全身生毛的哺乳动物。
(2)兽形的。参见“獸侯”、“獸環”。
(3)如野兽般的。比喻野蛮、下流。参见“獸心”、“獸性”、“獸欲”。
(4)干肉。
(5)通“狩”。打猎。
(6)通“嘼”。牲畜，家畜。
(7)唐人因避唐高祖李渊祖李虎讳，往往把虎字改作“獸”。参见“獸口”、“獸穴”、“獸吻”。

獸字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獸； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页721第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?舒救切，音狩。【說文】守備者。从嘼从犬。【爾雅·釋鳥】四足而毛謂之獸。【書·益稷】百獸率舞，庶尹允諧。【周禮·天官】獸人掌罟田獸，辨其名物。又【天官·庖人】六獸。【註】鄭司農云：六獸：麋、鹿、熊、麕、野豕、兔也。　又【儀禮·特牲饋食禮】棜在其南，南順。實獸于其上，東首。【註】獸，腊也。

獸字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
獸字的起名意思

暂无。

beast
Basic explanation of words
beast
shòu
See "Beast".
beast
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shòu］
["Guang Yun" Shu Jiuqie, go to You, book. ]
Traditional characters for "兽1".
(1) Generally refers to four-legged, hairy mammals.
(2) Animal-shaped. See "beast hou", "beast ring".
(3) Like a beast. It is a savage and indecent metaphor. See "Animal Heart", "Animal Nature", "Animal Desire".
(4) Dried meat.
(5) Through "hunting". hunt.
(6) Through "嘼". Livestock, livestock.
(7) Tang people often changed the word "tiger" to "beast" because they avoided the taboo of Li Yuanzu, the emperor of the Tang Dynasty, Li Hu. See "Beast Mouth", "Beast Den", "Beast Kiss".
beast
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　 Beast; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: Page 721 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Shu save cut, sound hunting. [Said the text] Defender. Cong from the dog. 【Erya·Shiniao】It is a beast with four legs and hair. 【Book·Yiji】All the beasts dance at the rate, and Yin Yunxie is the concubine. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan】The orc palms the beast and distinguishes its name. Also【Tianguan·庖人】The six beasts. [Note] Zheng Sinongyun: Six beasts: elk, deer, bear, noodle, wild pig, and rabbit.　[Ritual Ceremony·Special Sacrifice Feeding Ceremony] In the south, Namsun. The real beast is on it, the east head. [Note] Beast, Laye.
